00024 //RES_NAME RETRIEVAL:
00025 $name_type = "";
00026 if ($_GET["res_type"] == "observatories")
00027         $name_type = "name";
00028 elseif($_GET["res_type"] == "space_missions")
00029         $name_type = "mission_name";
00030 
00031 $query = "SELECT " . $name_type . " FROM " . $_GET["res_type"] . " WHERE id=" . $_GET["id"];
00032 $result = mysqli_query($link, $query);
00033 $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00034 mysqli_free_result($result);
00035 mysqli_close($link);
00036 
00037 ?>
